item.description:
Si vous etes libre pendant l'apres-midi, venez nous joindre!
Francois Truffaut's nouvelle vague film Les quatre cents coups will be shown at 1:30 -with a light lunch offered at 1:00. All for only $5!
If you've never seen it, it is a very important film that changed the direction of French cinema. Many people have seen it 5 or more times and get something new from it each time.
There will be a discussion about the film afterwards facilitated by Dianne.
Real Art Ways is a beautiful arts center with a comfortable theatre and free parking.
Please come if you can!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Les 400 coups
